I've even heard proposals of just getting a sample from the entire population. Now something about it makes me not like requiring DNA samples to be given, but at the same time why not? The only problem would be the possibility of a corrupt police force framing someone, and the ability to solve crimes would increase by a lot. Your thoughts?
